input_text.Prompt:
Given a product specification and product keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product specification:
MLB Philadelphia Phillies Delay Of Game Ath Red/Athletic Gray Marled Long Sleeve Mock Nck Synthetic Frntry Fzip

Product keywords:
Cotton 94%/Organic Cotton 6%
Long Sleeve Mock Neck Synthetic French Teery Full-Zip
Woven Label
Self-Fabric Applique.
Egypt
input_text.Response A: The Phillies Delay Of Game Long Sleeve Mock Neck Synthetic French Teery Full-Zip is perfect for a chilly game day, or any day! Made of 94% Cotton/6% Organic Cotton, this comfortable, versatile top features a woven label, self-fabric applique, and a full-zip front. Made in Egypt, it looks great with your favorite team's colors. Root on your Phillies in style!
input_text.Response B:
ian Cotton.
High Quality.
Soft To The Touch.
Sizes: S-4XL.
Rib-Knit Cuffs And Hem.
Machine Washable.
Imported.

The product is a high-quality long-sleeved mock neck synthetic French terry full-zip jacket made from a blend of cotton and organic cotton. It features a woven label and self-fabric applique for a unique and stylish appearance. The Egyptian cotton and high-quality materials make it soft to the touch and comfortable to wear. The rib-knit cuffs and hem provide a snug fit and the jacket is machine washable. It comes in sizes S-4XL and is imported from a reliable source.
